Expert Craftsmanship Attention to Detail Quality Materials Personalized Service Explore More Discover the full potential of your furniture with our expert restoration services. We offer a wide range of solutions to meet your needs, from restoring vintage pieces to creating custom designs that reflect your personal style. Furniture Restoration Starting from $99 / year Expert restoration services to revive your furniture's beauty. Schedule Consultation Explore Services Buy Now Dolorum esse odio quas architecto sint Frequently Ask Questions Do you offer custom furniture designs? Yes, we specialize in creating custom furniture designs tailored to your preferences and specifications. Our artisans work closely with you to bring your vision to life. What is your furniture restoration process? Our restoration process involves careful assessment, meticulous repair, and refinishing to ensure your furniture is restored to its original beauty. We use high-quality materials and techniques to achieve the best results. How long does a typical restoration take? The duration of a restoration project depends on the complexity and condition of the piece. Generally, it can take anywhere from a few days to several weeks. We will provide a detailed timeline after evaluating your furniture. Do you offer pickup and delivery services? Yes, we offer convenient pickup and delivery services for your furniture. Please contact us to arrange the details and ensure your pieces are safely transported to and from our workshop. Where can I find your workshop? Our workshop is located at C, 55, Shivalik Rd, Block C, Shivalik Colony, Malviya Nagar, Delhi, New Delhi, Delhi 110017. You are welcome to visit us during our operating hours. What are your business hours? Our workshop is open from Monday to Saturday, from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM. We are closed on Sundays and public holidays. Do you accept both Paypal and Stripe? Yes, we accept payments through both Paypal and Stripe for your convenience. What is your refund policy? We offer a 30-day refund period for our services. If you are not satisfied with the restoration or customization, please contact us within 30 days of delivery for a refund. Testimonial Ricky Fisher “Explore the artistry of furniture restoration at Revival Furniture Studio. Our skilled artisans are dedicated to preserving the beauty and history of your cherished pieces.” Ken Davis “Discover the craftsmanship of antique furniture restoration at Revival Furniture Studio. We specialize in reviving heirloom pieces to their former glory.” Mellisa Griffin “Explore our commitment to sustainable furniture restoration practices. We use eco-friendly materials and techniques to preserve your furniture and the environment.” Robert Steward “Learn about our tailored approach to custom furniture restoration. From concept to execution, we ensure each piece reflects your unique style and preferences.” Get In Touch Contact Us Email: restorationfurniturestudio@gmail.com Phone: +91-483-0683027 Location: C, 55, Shivalik Rd, Block C, Shivalik Colony, Malviya Nagar, Delhi, New Delhi, Delhi 110017 I accept Privacy policy Need to know more on details. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | RevivalFurnitureStudio Home About Us Our Work Contact Us Restoration Furniture Studio Home About Us Our Work Contact Us Privacy Policy Effective Date: 2024-06-12 RevivalFurnitureStudio ("we", "our", "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website https://revival-furniture-studio.html, including any other media form, media channel, mobile website, or mobile application related or connected thereto (collectively, the "Site"). Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site. 1. Information We Collect We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect on the Site includes: Personal Data: Personally identifiable information, such as your name, shipping address, email address, and telephone number, and demographic information, such as your age, gender, hometown, and interests, that you voluntarily give to us when you register with the Site or when you choose to participate in various activities related to the Site, such as online chat and message boards. Derivative Data: Information our servers automatically collect when you access the Site, such as your IP address, your browser type, your operating system, your access times, and the pages you have viewed directly before and after accessing the Site. Financial Data: Financial information, such as data related to your payment method (e.g., valid credit card number, card brand, expiration date) that we may collect when you purchase, order, return, exchange, or request information about our services from the Site. Data From Social Networks: User information from social networking sites, such as Facebook, Google+, Instagram, including your name, your social network username, location, gender, birth date, email address, profile picture, and public data for contacts, if you connect your account to such social networks. 2. Use of Your Information Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use information collected about you via the Site to: Create and manage your account. Process your transactions and manage purchases. Send you marketing and promotional communications. Respond to customer service requests and support needs more efficiently. Improve our website and marketing efforts. Understand and analyze how you use our website and products. Administer surveys, contests, or other site features. 3. Disclosure of Your Information We may share information we have collected about you in certain situations. Your information may be disclosed as follows: By Law or to Protect Rights: If we believe the release of information about you is necessary to respond to legal process, to investigate or remedy potential violations of our policies, or to protect the rights, property, and safety of others, we may share your information as permitted or required by any applicable law, rule, or regulation. Business Transfers: We may share or transfer your information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business to another company. Third-Party Service Providers: We may share your information with third parties that perform services for us or on our behalf, including payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer service, and marketing assistance. Marketing Communications: With your consent, or with an opportunity for you to withdraw consent, we may share your information with third parties for marketing purposes, as permitted by law. 4. Security of Your Information We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable, and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other types of misuse. 5. Policy for Children We do not knowingly solicit information from or market to children under the age of 13. If we learn that we have collected information from a child under age 13 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information as quickly as possible. If you become aware of any data we have collected from children under age 13, please contact us using the contact information provided below. 6. Options Regarding Your Information You may at any time review or change the information in your account or terminate your account by: Logging into your account settings and updating your account. Contacting us using the contact information provided below. Upon your request to terminate your account, we will deactivate or delete your account and information from our active databases. However, some information may be retained in our files to prevent fraud, troubleshoot problems, assist with any investigations, enforce our Terms of Use and/or comply with legal requirements. 7. Emails and Communications If you no longer wish to receive correspondence, emails, or other communications from us, you may opt-out by: Noting your preferences at the time you register your account with the Site. Logging into your account settings and updating your preferences. Contacting us using the contact information provided below. 8. Contact Us If you have questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: RevivalFurnitureStudio C, 55, Shivalik Rd, Block C, Shivalik Colony, Malviya Nagar, Delhi, New Delhi, Delhi 110017 Phone: +91-483-0683027 Email: restorationfurniturestudio@gmail.com About Us Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions | RevivalFurnitureStudio Home About Us Our Work Contact Us Restoration Furniture Studio Home About Us Our Work Contact Us RevivalFurnitureStudio Terms and Conditions Welcome to RevivalFurnitureStudio! These Terms of Use (“Terms”) govern your access to and use of the RevivalFurnitureStudio website located at https://revival-furniture-studio.html and all related services (collectively, the “Site”). 1. Acceptance of Terms By using the Site, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the Site. 2. Changes to Terms We reserve the right to modify these Terms at our sole discretion at any time. You should periodically check these Terms for updates. Your continued use of the Site following the posting of any changes to these Terms will constitute your acceptance of those changes. 3. Access to the Site We strive to make the Site available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. However, we do not guarantee that the Site will be uninterrupted. Access to the Site may be temporarily suspended for maintenance, technical issues, or other reasons beyond our control. 4. You agree not to use the Site to: Post or transmit any content that is illegal, threatening, abusive, defamatory, pornographic, obscene, indecent, or otherwise violates these Terms; Infringe the intellectual property rights or other rights of any third party; Transmit any viruses or other malicious code; Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the Site or any other system or network; Interfere with the operation of the Site or disrupt the Site in any way; Collect or process the personal information of other users without their consent. 5. User Content Any content that you post on the Site (such as reviews, comments, images) is your sole responsibility. You represent and warrant that you are the owner of such content or that you have all necessary rights and permissions to post such content. You are solely responsible for the accuracy, completeness, and legality of such content. We reserve the right to remove any content that we believe violates these Terms or is otherwise objectionable. 6. Intellectual Property All content on the Site, including but not limited to text, images, logos, audio and video materials, is owned by RevivalFurnitureStudio or its licensors and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not copy, reproduce, republish, upload, post, transmit, distribute, modify, create derivative works of, display, or commercially exploit any content from the Site without the prior written permission of RevivalFurnitureStudio. 7. RevivalFurnitureStudio disclaims all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. RevivalFurnitureStudio does not warrant that the Site will operate error-free or be secure or without errors, that defects will be corrected, or that the Site or the server that makes it available are free of viruses or other harmful components. 8. Limitation of Liability RevivalFurnitureStudio will not be liable for any damages arising from your use of or inability to use the Site, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages, even if RevivalFurnitureStudio has been advised of the possibility of such damages. 9. Indemnification p>You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless RevivalFurnitureStudio, its officers, directors, employees, agents, licensors, and suppliers from and against any and all claims, demands, suits, losses, liabilities, costs (including attorney’s fees) and expenses arising out of or in connection with your use of the Site, your violation of these Terms, or any other act or omission by you. 10. Links to Third-Party Websites The Site may contain links to third-party websites. These links are provided for your convenience. RevivalFurnitureStudio is not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites. 11. Termination RevivalFurnitureStudio may terminate your access to the Site at any time for any reason. 12. Governing Law These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. 13. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us by phone at +91-483-0683027 or by email at restorationfurniturestudio@gmail.com 14. Severability If any part of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable, such part shall be struck and the remaining Terms shall remain in full force and effect. 15. Entire Agreement These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and RevivalFurnitureStudio relating to your use of the Site and supersede all prior or contemporaneous communications, representations, or agreements, whether oral or written, with respect to the subject matter of this Agreement. 17.
